Package thorwin.math.geo.projection

Provides classes for projecting 3-dimensional spheroids (Earth) on a 2-dimensional space.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CylindricalProjection
    A cylindrical projection is a specific map projection in which meridians are mapped to equal spaced lines, and parallels are mapped to horizontal lines.
    MapProjection
    Map projection of a spheroid on a 2D surface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MercatorProjection
    Mercator projection implementation.
    PlateCarreProjection
    Very simple projection that maps longitude/latitude directly to x/y.

Package thorwin.math.geo.projection Description

Provides classes for projecting 3-dimensional spheroids (Earth) on a 2-dimensional space.
